Reviews.Title: Great Android Phone
Reviews.Author: cobra2
Reviews.Content: Best DROID I've had to date. Battery has to be charged every couple of days with medium use....way better then my S2. Nice camera and video. Big screen, but not too big. Makes it easy to read screen. Easy to navigate I would reccommend the Razr MAXX for anyone

Reviews.Title: Loving this phone
Reviews.Author: Tammy Meyers
Reviews.Content: It took a bit of time to receive this phone but it was worth the wait. I was using a regular Droid before I got this, which made the transition easy for me. I love all the apps I can use and the 4g is sooo much faster. The battery life is great! If I am not using my phone very much, a charge will last 3 or 4 days. It is fast and efficient. I am getting used to the phone's keyboard as my other phone had a pull out keyboard but that comes with time and use.

Reviews.Title: Never buying new again
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: This phone is great! Works just as well as the brand new one that caught my fall. I'm not sure why I ever buy new phones with contract upgrades, this was cheaper!

Reviews.Title: Satisfactory
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was only looking for a phone to make it through the next year of my contract after I broke my Galaxy S3. I ordered this phone new and it certainly did not come new. When I turned on the phone it did not automatically bring me to the easy set up. Furthermore, there was already a video loaded onto the phone. I did a factory restore and after that it was easy to set up.As far as the system goes, it is a bit slow for me. It's only running on Jelly bean 4.1.2 and Motorola currently has no intention of updating this. There is no default was to manage tasks or save the battery like higher versions of Android have so I downloaded apps to do replace this feature. Most apps are compatible with this version of Android however, I have encountered a couple which were not. These apps were simple maintenance apps and again easy to replace. Perhaps, I am being a bit high maintenance myself, but I think it's important to know the few restrictions on the phone.All in all, it will suffice but there are certainly a few sacrifices made for the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Faulty phone out of the box
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as "new" and again, it clearly is not new. The phone wouldn't activate as it had a faulty IMEI number. It was also very buggy, opening programs and typing sporadically by itself. It also would reach a 20% charging level and stop there. I am returning this phone immediately.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice!
Reviews.Author: Vircury
Reviews.Content: Phone was in great condition. Better then great. Phone was like new. Battery is great. Especially when comparing it with my old phone, the Rezound.  Delivery was very quick. Got it faster then expected. Only downside was I had to get a new sim card. It uses a much smaller one then my old phone. Which wasn't a downside at all because I went to the Verizon store and explained the situation. They switched over everything painlessly and easily in a matter of minutes and they gave me a new much smaller sim free of charge. I also got to keep my unlimited plan and I am now able to use the foxfi app for hotspot on this phone unlike my old Rezound which blocked the app. All together a win win for me.

Reviews.Title: Poor battery life and charging issues
Reviews.Author: Kara
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived on time but the battery hardly lasts at all.  This is very disappointing since I purchased this model specifically for the long battery life.  Additionally, I frequently have trouble getting the phone to charge.  I have to plug it in repeatedly and place the phone "just so" before it'll consistently take a charge.  I'm not happy.

Reviews.Title: Excelent service but had problem with phone.
Reviews.Author: cpiner
Reviews.Content: The eQuick company was great to work with and they did everything they could to satisfy me but, I received my phone very promptly and had it activated but it had a bad speaker.  They immediately sent me another phone that worked fine at first but it froze up on the second day which is very rare.  I requested a refund and an RA which they did without question.  Sorry that the phones I received were bad but the company was great.

Reviews.Title: Longest battery on the market
Reviews.Author: Batman
Reviews.Content: 3 days i had this phone on and off. occasional game and browsing google play etcAlmost 3 days it was at 50% so i decided to charge.I use phone rarely, only to play or just spend time. This one was perfect. Cheap/powerful/fast/big screenwhat else would u want ?

Reviews.Author: Larissa
Reviews.Content: Although at first there were a few problems with shipping and whatnot I thoroughly enjoyed how each time I had a problem they were eager to help me. The phone is awesome. And I am happy that I went through the seller that I did. I recommend them to anyone. :)

Reviews.Title: I was sold a stolen phone.
Reviews.Author: SN
Reviews.Content: No joke. I paid almost $300 for this phone back in March - phone arrived in sealed package, with everything seeming legit until I went to activate it with Verizon I was told the phone is useless to me as it was flagged as being stolen. beware 3rd party sellers and shame on verizon for forcing me to get a phone elsewhere just to keep my unlimited data.

Reviews.Title: Would this be a spam?
Reviews.Author: Giavauna
Reviews.Content: Please allow yourself time to Google between a Droid Razr, as shown, and not a Droid Razr Maxx as advertised

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: KrissyJ82
Reviews.Content: I was 3 months away from my upgrade and my Stratosphere kept crapping out on me.  I didn't want to wait and every time Verizon sent me a new Stratosphere it would work fine for a few days and then it would crap out.  I didn't want the HD version of this phone so I decided to try Amazon.  They had a used one sold by GottaGetaPhone.  It's works great!! I can't even tell that it was used.  The battery lasts me 2 to 3 days between charges depending on usage.  And best part is that I've had it for a month and it hasn't crapped out on me!!
